# prepareToPlay()

**Instance Method**

Prepares the player to play the sequence by prerolling all events.

## Declaration

```swift
func prepareToPlay()
```

## Discussion

The system automatically calls this method on playback, but calling it in advance minimizes the delay between calling [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIPlayer/play(_:)] and the start of sound output.

## Controlling playback

- **play(_:)**: Plays the MIDI sequence.
- **AVMIDIPlayerCompletionHandler**: A callback the system invokes when MIDI playback completes.
- **stop()**: Stops playing the sequence.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sequence is playing.
